snippet: Nicole Henry’s show at Feinstein’s, “So Good, So Right,” is an anthology of 1970s pop and soul, from Joni Mitchell to Aretha Franklin to Bob Marley.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews performance by singer Nicole Henry at Feinstein’s at Loews Regency.
lead_paragraph: Nicole Henry’s show at Feinstein’s, “So Good, So Right,” is an anthology of 1970s pop and soul, from Joni Mitchell to Aretha Franklin to Bob Marley.

headline.main: Let’s Show Some Respect for Songs From the ’70s
headline.print_headline: Let’s Show Some Respect For Songs From the ’70s
